---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
df <- read_csv("countries.csv")
```

```{r}
df %>%
  ggplot(aes(Country)) +
  geom_bar(aes(fill = Country), width = 0.5) +
  geom_text(stat = 'count', aes(label = ..count..), vjust = -0.25) +
  labs(x = "Countries", y = "Count") +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(legend.position="none")
```
